quizData.question: This focuses on managing, maintaining, inspecting, and repairing plants of business assets throughout its life cycle.
For this system, assets refer to the equipment, machinery, and facilities that an organization has.

Which benefit specifies the statement?
By proactively managing maintenance, unexpected breakdowns are lessened, eventually increasing critical asset reliability.

Which benefit specifies the statement?
This leads to reduced downtime, faster response time, and optimized resource utilization. Businesses can operate without worries as assets are in good condition.

Which benefit specifies the statement?
Through better asset management, businesses can control maintenance expenses, minimize unnecessary parts inventory, and extend the lifespan of assets.

Which benefit specifies the statement?
The business can meet regulatory compliance requirements and ensure that safety standards are upheld.
This is an independent environment in the system.
This is the smallest organizational unit where a legal set of books can be maintained.
This is the operating area of a branch within the company. It can be a manufacturing, distribution, purchasing, or maintenance facility
This is an organizational unit allowing differentiation between the various stocks of material in a plant.
It is required to store spare parts.
This is the plant wherein the technical objects of a company are installed and has oriented organizational units such as Location, Plant Section, and Work Center.
This is the plant in which maintenance tasks are planned and prepared.
Which are the two parts of the Location?
This is responsibility for working assets.
This is the process measures of plant maintenance.
